content: अनुकाम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [कामस्य सदृशः अनुरूपो वा] {@--1@} Agreeable to desire, according to one's desire. {@--2@} [अनुकामयते कम्-अच्] Desirous, lustful. --मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} At will, according to desire or wish, as desired, at pleasure. --मः [ अनुरूपः कामः] Proper or worthy desire; desire; °कृत् fulfilling one's desires.
